https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wke2THL4djUR8b8VfEj0XZI5XW2.jpg A Korean-American secret agent from USA sneaks into Korea. He tries to make money by selling a high-priced painting. However, he is soon chased by the ones unwilling to expose it, and meets a woman who wants the painting. An American Friend
